description: Local voice dictation with AI editing - open source Wispr Flow alternative

features.name: Audio recording
features.description: Record audio from microphone using sounddevice
features.notes: Works but needs system mic to be set correctly (not virtual devices)

features.name: Whisper transcription
features.description: Transcribe audio using faster-whisper locally
features.notes: Base model loads in ~0.8s, transcribes 3s audio in ~1s

features.name: Basic text editor
features.description: Rule-based filler word removal and cleanup
features.notes: Instant, removes um/uh/like/you know

features.name: AI text editor - Ollama
features.description: AI cleanup using local Ollama LLM
features.notes: Works with llama3.2:3b, ~3-4s response time

features.name: AI text editor - Cloud APIs
features.description: AI cleanup using OpenAI/Anthropic APIs
features.notes: Code complete, not tested (needs API keys)

features.name: Text typing at cursor
features.description: Insert transcribed text at current cursor position
features.notes: Uses pynput, supports paste for long text

features.name: Global hotkey
features.description: Cmd+Shift+Space to start/stop recording
features.notes: Supports hold-to-talk and push-to-toggle modes

features.name: CLI mode
features.description: Terminal-based interface with hotkey support
features.notes: rodin --cli

features.name: Menu bar app
features.description: macOS menu bar app using rumps
features.notes: Shows settings, model selection, presets

features.name: CLI test commands
features.description: --test, --benchmark, --record-test commands
features.notes: Useful for debugging and benchmarking

features.name: Floating overlay button
features.description: Wispr Flow-style floating mic button on screen
features.notes: Fixed acceptsFirstMouse_ for click handling. Button appears on right side, clickable, hover states work.

features.name: Audio device selection
features.description: Select specific audio input device in config
features.notes: Added to config.py and recorder.py, needs commit

features.name: Microphone permission handling
features.description: Proper permission prompts and error messages
features.notes: Currently requires manual permission grant in System Settings

features.name: Recording animation
features.description: Visual feedback during recording (pulsing icon)
features.notes: Button turns red during recording. Pulsing animation implemented.

features.name: Sound effects
features.description: Audio feedback for start/stop recording
features.notes: Config has play_sounds setting, not implemented

features.name: Windows support
features.description: Cross-platform support for Windows
features.notes: Core code should work, UI needs pystray instead of rumps

features.name: Transcription stats database
features.description: SQLite database tracking all transcriptions with word counts, apps, time saved
features.notes: stats.py - supports lifetime/today/week/month/year stats, top words, top apps

features.name: Resilient audio buffering
features.description: Audio saved immediately, transcribed later - never lose recordings
features.notes: audio_queue.py - saves to pending/, processes on startup, retries on failure

features.name: Offline model download
features.description: --download-model command for offline-first operation
features.notes: Models downloaded once, strictly local runtime - no HuggingFace at runtime

features.name: Stats CLI commands
features.description: --stats, --stats-today, --history, --pending commands
features.notes: View transcription history and statistics from CLI

features.name: Mac app with settings UI
features.description: Native macOS app with menu bar and preferences window
features.notes: app.py - NSStatusBar item, preferences window with model/mode/editor selection

features.name: Sound effects
features.description: Audio feedback for recording start/stop
features.notes: sounds.py - Uses macOS system sounds (Tink, Pop)
